sources.title: Weapon | Full Movie | Drama Thriller | Andy Gathergood
sources.description:
Weapon - An ex-soldier seeking support for his personal problems finds his world spiralling out of control.
2020.  Stars: Ian Virgo, Andy Gathergood, Rez Kempton

metadata.Plot: Agni a YouTuber who is a dedicated environmentalist is searching for a superhuman (Mithran), to shoot and add as content for his channel. The journey is full of twists and turns as he is not the only one searching for him.
